Global Dataset on Higher Education Institutions
text: IAU WHED - World Higher Education Database, available https://whed.net/home.php

title: WHED Dataset — whed
text: dataset contains institution-level information higher education institutions around world.

title: WHED Dataset — whed
text: data frame 21165 rows 15 variables: name Name institution url Website URL institution country Country institution located id Unique identifier institution city City institution located name_detail Detailed name institution funding_type Type funding institution (e.g., public, private) languages Languages used institution accrediting_agency Accrediting agency institution year_founded Year institution founded academic_year Academic year details degree_name List column containing names degrees degree_fields_study List column containing fields study degrees division_name List column containing names divisions division_fields_study List column containing fields study divisions

what: Transform WHED Data to Wide Format — whed_wide

text: function transforms WHED dataset wide format individual columns degree division.
